member.name: T:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die #FF1B86FF ähnelt.

member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die Illusion.exe ähnelt.

member.name: P:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources.InstallDirectory
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die Illusion Launcher ähnelt.

member.name: P:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources.LauncherVersion
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die 1.0.0 ähnelt.

member.name: P:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources.SaveDirectory
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die Pokemon Illusion ähnelt.

member.name: P:XVLauncher.Properties.Resources.UpdateUrl
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die https://gitlab.com/schlingelentwicklerstudio/Schlingel/-/raw/{0}/ ähnelt.

member.name: T:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager
member.summary:
This class provides methods to dialog with php files. To implement the methods of this class you need a server to host php files and a database.
Php files and MySQL query to create the appropriate table are provided in the GitHub repository.

member.name: F:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.USE_PHP
member.summary: Set it to true if you want to use php files to communicate with your server. Check the documntation for more details.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.GetMegaUrl
member.summary: Getter method for .

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.GetLastVer
member.summary: Getter method for lastVer.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.GetID(System.String)
member.summary: Assign to user a new auto-increment ID.
member.param: current game version tag.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.UpdateVersion(System.String)
member.summary:
Update user current version in the database.
Since in the database the column last_date is setted as ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, this method can also be used to update that column.
For example, it can be called whenever the game is launched, so the database will register the last time each id has launched the game.
It can be useful to know if someone is still playing the game (using the application/using whatever this launcher is used to) after months or years.
member.param: User current version.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.FirstContact
member.summary:
Try to contact server and, if the connection is successful, set url to mega archive in megaurl and the tag of the last version available in lastVer.
This method should not be used if the game is stored in a GitLab repository, in that case version tag can be retrieved with , while megaurl is no more useful.
member.returns: true if the conncection is successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.ReportError(System.String)
member.summary:
Store error message in last_error column.
Also update error_date column with current timestamp.
member.param: Error message.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Resources.PhpManager.SendPost(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Helper method provided by makim on this Stack Overflow thread: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6960426/c-sharp-xml-documentation-website-link.
member.param: In case of Exception, don't call ReportError if it is false. Default is true, but in some cases it can be useful to set it to false to avoid loops.

member.name: T:XVLauncher.SecurityManager
member.summary: Singleton class to generate php files path, just to avoid to put it as plain text. It is a really basic security system, do not use it to protect sensible data.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.SecurityManager.GetInstance
member.summary: Singleton pattern's getter method.

member.summary: Subclass of that handle updates from GitLab repository.

member.summary: Constructor method.
member.param: instance where are placed GUI elements to be updated to show progress.
List of path that do not exists in the new update, because file have been mooved or deleted.
List of new path
An instance of

member.summary: Class for handling updates with git-based repositories.

member.summary: The instance of MainWindow that contains GUI elements which show update progress and status.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.UpdateHandler.#ctor(XVLauncher.MainWindow)
member.summary: Constructor of the UpdateHandler class.
member.param: The window where the updater will be called.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.UpdateHandler.CheckUpdateAvailability
member.summary: Check if it there is a new release on GitLab repo.
member.returns: true if there is an update available, false otherwise.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.UpdateHandler.Compare(System.String)
member.summary: Compares the currently stored commit id with a target commit id and returns a tuple of list with the old paths and new paths of changed files.
member.param: The target commit id using for comparing.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.UpdateHandler.GetLatestRelease
member.summary: Retrieves the latest github release informations.
member.returns: last release download link, last commit name, last release tag.

member.name: T:XVLauncher.Downloader
member.summary: Abstract class that provides the template method Download(). It is implemented by and .

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Downloader.#ctor(XVLauncher.MainWindow,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor method.
member.param: instance where are placed GUI elements to be updated to show progress.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Downloader.Download
member.summary:
Template method that only handle exceptions and do some simples GUI changes.
Real Download implementation is delegated to sublasses that must implement the abstract method .

member.name: M:XVLauncher.Downloader.DownloadImplementation
member.summary:
Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses, that must provide download implementation, possibly asynchronously.
It is called by the template method

member.name: T:XVLauncher.MainWindow
member.summary: Interaction logic for MainWindow.xaml
MainWindow

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.#ctor
member.summary:
This method is called when the program starts.
It checks if the user has an ID assigned, if not it try to get a new ID from the database and assign it to the user.
Then check if there are fonts to be installed and, if it is the case, installs them.
Finally, initialise the GUI.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.Window_Loaded(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: It is called when the GUI is loaded. It implements the main logic of the program.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Tick on the dispatchtimer called every 10 seconds. Used to update background Images.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.DisplayNextImage(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Animation code for the image changing

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.DownloadAndInstall(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Start download. When it finishes, start unzipping.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.Unzip(System.String)
member.summary: Unzip a file and show progress in .
member.param: Archive to uzip's full path.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.LaunchGame(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Search for program executable and launch it.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.InitPlayButton
member.summary: Enable , change its color and content and set as function to be called on click.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.MoveWindow(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Make top Rectangle draggable

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.CloseWindow(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Close the window and display any catched exception message in a popup window.

member.summary: Show/hide options windows. In addition hide notice window.

member.summary: Updates the progress bar to the given value.
member.param: The target value.

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.SetBarIdle(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate = idle
member.param: true for show indeterminate loading, false otherwise

member.name: M:XVLauncher.MainWindow.RemoveRoutedEventHandlers(System.Windows.UIElement,System.Windows.RoutedEvent)
member.summary: Removes all event handlers subscribed to the specified routed event from the specified element. Credit: https://stackoverflow.com/a/16392387/1149773
member.param: The UI element on which the routed event is defined.
The routed event for which to remove the event handlers.
